TEXT: A time-traveller stuck in a decaying time loop.
You distort the space around yourself in your intensity...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~brother,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

#y~FATIGUE.~ NL NL She falls to the ground, lifeless, the #rassailant's face obscured by a hood. A sight you've seen #beight-hundred #band #bforty-three times now. Each loop, your body ~weaker,~ trying something different... NL #r@ANYTHING@ #r@different...@ NL NL And for a moment, you think you've finally escaped, before the world seems to tug at you again- the loop sustaining itself... NL ~You~ ~should~ #r@never@ ~have~ ~gone~ ~back.~ NL As time distorts, something has changed. A terrible #r@beating@ #r@noise@ fills your ears. You wake up in an unfamiliar place...
